member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.UI.Xaml.CanvasSwapChainPanel
member.summary: A swap chain panel is a XAML control which draws to a swap chain.

remarks.p: The size of the swap chain may be different from the control's layout size. In particular, it does not stretch to fill the control. For more information on swap chains, see .
When using CanvasSwapChainPanel from managed code, care must be taken to avoid memory leaks due to reference count cycles. See Avoiding memory leaks for more information.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.UI.Xaml.CanvasSwapChainPanel.RemoveFromVisualTree
member.summary: Removes the control from the last FrameworkElement it was parented to.

remarks.p: When using this control from managed code it is necessary to ensure that all references to it are released, otherwise it will not get garbage collected correctly. To do this, call RemoveFromVisualTree from the Unloaded event handler of the page that the control was on and then release any explicit references to it.
For more information, see Avoiding memory leaks.
